title: Met on the Net (CRE224)
description:
A Classic RISK! episode from our first two years! In the twenty fourth episode of our second season, AJ Jacobs, Adam Lowitt, and Erica Freeman tell stories of some pretty strange encounters, courtesy of the Interwebs.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Make a one-time donation to RISK! at PayPal.me/RISKshow

Get tickets to RISK! live shows at RISK-show.com/tour

Get the RISK! book at TheRISKBook.com

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison to make a personalized video at Cameo.com/TheKevinAllison

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Adam Lowitt, Kevin Allison, Erica Freeman, AJ Jacobs, B’O’K, Royal Teeth, The Cinema, Jeff Barr, Shawn Lee’s Ping Pong Orchestra, Trevor Jude Smith)
